Package com.ultreon.craft.client.gui

Class GuiComponent

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.craft.client.gui.GuiComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiStateListener, Widget, Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GuiContainer
@Deprecated public abstract class GuiComponent extends Object implements GuiStateListener, Widget
Deprecated.
Controllable widget, a widget that can be controlled by the user. This widget contains input event handlers like keyPress(int) and mouseClick(int, int, int, int)

  • Method Details

    • mouseClick

      public boolean mouseClick(int x, int y, int button, int count)
      Deprecated.
      Handler for mouse clicking.
      Should only be overridden, and not called unless you know what you are doing.
      Parameters:
      x - the x position when clicked.
      y - the y position when clicked.
      button - the button used.
      count - the number of sequential clicks.

    • mousePress

      public boolean mousePress(int x, int y, int button)
      Deprecated.
      Handler for mouse button press.
      Should only be overridden, and not called unless you know what you are doing.
      Parameters:

      y - the y position when pressed.
      button - the button used.
